attributes.action: Stop Travel Agents Increasing Their Fares When The Schools are on Holiday
attributes.additional_details:
We the general public would like the government to take action on the travel industry to stop them from inflating their prices when the school holidays are on.

We do not see why we should pay inflated costs for school holidays when the cost is dramatically less either side of the school holidays.

This way you would see less children missing school time because their parents have booked a holiday during school term time as it is a lot cheaper.
